testsuite.name: testscript.ExecuteLeadTest
testsuite.system-out: *****1.Launch the browser***** Opening Browser *****2.Enter the url***** *****3.Enter mobile number***** *****4.Select the Operator ***** *****5.Select Recharge amount***** *****6.Click Pay Button***** *****7.Verify if the user is able to reach the next screen(Payment screen)***** *****8.On payment screen click on Tarjeta***** *****9.Click Usar nueva tarjeta radio button***** *****10.Enter card number***** *****11.Enter Month***** *****12.Enter Date***** *****13.Enter CVV***** *****14.Enter email id under correo electronico***** *****15.Click on Pagar con Tarjeta to do the recharge***** *****16.Inside popup enter email***** *****17.Inside popup enter password ***** *****18.Automate click on I'm not a robot Google captcha***** *****19.Click Login to proceed payment***** *****20.Confirmation popup Handling for selecting another account***** *****21.Select alternative account for proceeding payment***** *****22.Click payment button for confirmation***** *****23.Handling popup***** *****24.Verification of success screen is navigated ***** *****25.Verify if the user gets a success message and recharge gets successful*****
